This prospective , multi-center , randomized , control , opening , superiority design clinical study . Plan enroll 172 eligible subject 15 center China , subject randomize 1:1 study group ( LEGFLOW OTW group , n=86 ) control group ( AMPHIRION DEEP group , n=86 ) , accept treatment LEGFLOW OTW AMPHIRION DEEP respectively .
